Reviews.Title: “Maybe a 'victim' of Tripadvisor success?”
Reviews.Author: dogsareforlife
Reviews.Content: ok mixed feelings hotel stayed junior suite nights weekend location ok convenient roads dallas dfw plus galleria shopping complex short drive staff exception delightfully helpful friendly couldnt fault credit hotel standard fairfield inn little gloomy dark ours 3rd floor overlooking building king sized bed presumably sofa bed flat screen tvs desk chair bathroom contained bath wc whilst outside sink vanity plus fridge coffee maker space top pool means aircon sucked smell chlorine nice hear kids time pool naturally peace quiet evenings short supply loud window wasnt breakfast internet access included price hotel paid 130 night reasonable reception stocked maintained scrambled egg sort sausage meat patty plus egg sausage biscuits microwave apple orange juice coffee tea selections fruit shape bananas apples fruit segments juice prepackaged believe 68 types cereals mini boxes plus waffle machine popular pastries toast available overall reasonable selection coffee available reception evenings popcorn night didnt try dont smelled nice shop snacks available laundry didnt try restaurant site evening meal deliver selection food menu card assume people town drive couple blocks north abundance family type eat nearby mcdonalds main issue hotel noisy doors slammed shut hear people arrived departed hairdryer literally deafening painful people surrounding heard whenever residence wardrobe doors squeaked lot fashioned airconditioning exceptionally noisy essential light sleeper issues hear airplane noise dfw love field miles lastly im afraid sound children allowed parents run corridors shouting wearing nights disappear sunday evening reasonable price compared choices guess family hotel weekends prepared lots noise guests maybe quieter week despite super staff wouldnt unless alternative

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff and well maintained property.”
Reviews.Author: Reesincal
Reviews.Content: stayed fairfield inn nights using marriott wife impressed friendly staff hotel bottom tier marriott property nice amenities indoor pool breakfast complimentary wireless clean comfortable relatively easy access interstate hear traffic noise wasnt terribly loud stay trip dallas

Reviews.Title: “Our new place to stay”

Reviews.Content: travel dallas bit stayed lot hotels favorites location brand hotel expecting pay paid 5900 night hotel close lot malls shopping centers check wish gotten gentlemans name checked helpful courteous true asset marriott team comfortable king bed 42 46 lcd tv free wifi coffee maker iron ironing board nice view definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Susan K
Reviews.Content: excellent stay quiet friendly staff breakfast enjoyed sandwiches variety cereals refrigerator microwave cooling drinks ice close restaurants hotel clean beds comfortable safe
